charges.charge_description: 18:1542 FALSE STATEMENT IN APPLICATION/USE OF PASSPORT (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The dft. is hereby committed to the custody of the U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 8 months. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. 1542: MAKE FALSE STATEMENTS IN AN APPLICATION FOR PASSPORT WITH INTENT TO INDUCE AND SECURE THE ISSUANCE OF A PASSPORT UNDER THE AUTHORITY OF THE UNITED STATES, FOR HIS OWN USE OR THE USE OF ANOTHER, CONTRARY TO THE LAWS REGULATING THE ISSUANCE OF PASSPORTS AND THE RULES PRESCRIBED PURSUANT. [1:96-m-2401]
